section.title: Time Entry Screen
section.para: When selecting a Line, the following screen will appear:

Time Entry
When entering a Time Entry, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: This displays the Sheet you are currently maintaining.
This displays the Line you are currently maintaining.
The date of the Sheet you are currently maintaining. There is a single Sheet Date per Sheet. The Work Date can vary by Line. Example: You may choose to bill for a month of working.
The date of the actual work was performed.

note.para: There is a single Sheet Date per Sheet. The Work Date can vary by Line. Example: You may chose to bill for a month of work.

listitem.para: Select Time or Expense (the fields change accordingly)
This is the Project Number.

note.para: Before entering project information be sure to verify the project status is "In-Process". You will not be able to select projects where the status is "Concept" or "Complete"

listitem.para: This is the Project Task. If a task isn't found, a DEFAULT task will be created.
This is the Customer number.
This is the Customer PO number. This is a free-form field. In the Pro version, Invoice Consolidation will make use of this value.
This is populated from the value provided on the Sheet.
The number of hours worked.
The rate is derived from the Task, Employee, Customer, or Item List Price. The order of priority is: Task, Employee, Customer, List Price. The rate can be manually entered as well.
This is the extended value from Hours x Rate.
Check this box is the entry if billable. In the Pro version, the entry will be invoiced when this is checked.
This is the Item number. This will list all Reference items that are not Expense items.
These are the Planned Hours as setup in the Project/Task.
These are the Actual Hours, compiled from Time entries.
These are the Planned Expenses as setup in the Project/Task.
These are the Actual Expenses, compiled from Expense entries.
Total of all the hours recorded for the same work date.
Total of all the hours recorded on the same time sheet.
These Notes will be printed on customer facing documentation. In the Pro version, these Notes will passed along to the Invoice line.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Select to navigate to previous line items on the same Sheet.
Select to create a new line item on the same Sheet.
Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Highlight a record and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the record.
